Package gui

Class TeamSetupScreen

java.lang.Object
gui.TeamSetupScreen
public class TeamSetupScreen extends Object
This is the TeamSetupScreen class. This screen will allow players to purchase their first 5 athletes so that they can start the game. Players are given an option to choose 5 from 6 players and the players are generated mostly randomly.
Author:
Yunu Cho, Kush Desai

    • tglButtonEvent

      public void tglButtonEvent(JToggleButton btn, JLabel pos, JLabel name, JLabel ovr, JLabel off, JLabel def, JLabel stam, JLabel agil, int index)
      When a JToggleButton is pressed to select an Athlete, it displays the information of its corresponding Athlete in a panel and adds the Athlete to the team. If the JToggleButton is deselected, the Athlete is removed from the team.
      Parameters:
      btn - the toggled JToggleButton
      pos - the position of the Athlete
      name - the name of the Athlete
      ovr - the overall stat of the Athlete
      off - the offence stat of the Athlete
      def - the defence stat of the Athlete
      stam - the stamina stat of the Athlete
      agil - the agility stat of the Athlete
      index - the index of the player in the Team

    • setAthleteButtons

      public void setAthleteButtons(ArrayList<JToggleButton> btns)
      Sets the JButtons to show the information of its corresponding Athlete.
      Parameters:
      btns - list of buttons that will be set to show Athletes' information.
